overview:
Tamara Littleton is the CEO and founder of eModeration Ltd., the user-generated content moderation and content management provider.

She has an established background in editorial quality control, fault escalation and process management gained from previous work as the Product Delivery Director for Chello Broadband and Online Operations Manager for BBC Online where she managed the world’s first ISO 9000 accredited team for digital publishing management and monitored over 400 BBC websites.

Tamara Littleton was a member of the Home Office Committee advising the British Government on moderation of communities to help safeguard children and she has also been the Chair of e-mint, the online community for community professionals.
